security_audit.summary: This skill contains only documentation and workflow specifications for PowerPoint generation. No executable code, network calls, or system access detected. Pure prompt-based skill with design principles and templates.

content.user_title: Generate Professional PowerPoint Decks with AI
content.value_statement: Creating professional presentations is time-consuming and requires design expertise. This skill provides a systematic framework for generating high-quality PowerPoint decks using evidence-based prompting and constraint-based design principles.
actual_capabilities: Generates 30+ slide professional presentations using html2pptx workflow
Implements constraint-based design with explicit prohibitions for reliability
Enforces accessibility standards (4.5:1 contrast, 18pt minimum fonts)
Uses multi-chat architecture for complex decks to manage context windows
Validates output against quantified specifications (margins, spacing, contrast)
Adapts brand guidelines while maintaining constraint compatibility
limitations: Requires html2pptx tool for optimal spatial precision
Prohibits border boxes and outline shapes for reliability
Single visual element per slide maximum
Complex decorative elements may be simplified for consistency
Brand integration requires adaptation of some visual elements

use_cases.title: Board presentations and investor decks
use_cases.description: Generate polished board decks with financial data integration, competitive analysis, and strategic recommendations using professional design standards.

use_cases.title: Client deliverables and project reports
use_cases.description: Create comprehensive project updates, market research presentations, and strategic analyses with consistent visual quality across 50+ slides.

use_cases.title: Campaign presentations and brand guidelines
use_cases.description: Build campaign performance reviews, brand strategy presentations, and marketing plans with integrated data visualization and brand compliance.

prompt_templates.title: Simple Financial Deck
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate a 12-slide financial presentation using the simple deck template. Include Q3 revenue analysis, cost breakdown, and Q4 recommendations. Use corporate blue (#0066cc) for accents, ensure all contrast ratios exceed 4.5:1, and validate no border boxes appear in output.

prompt_templates.title: Complex Strategic Analysis
prompt_templates.prompt: Use multi-chat architecture for comprehensive market entry analysis. Architect phase: analyze market data, create narrative structure, establish design plan with brand colors. Generate in 4 sections of 12-13 slides each. Final assembly: validate consistency, check data accuracy, ensure narrative flow.

prompt_templates.title: Brand-Compliant Deck
prompt_templates.prompt: Integrate our brand guidelines into PowerPoint generation. Extract colors from attached brand guide, adapt border elements to color blocks, maintain 0.6" margins per brand standard, and use approved typography. Validate brand recognition while ensuring constraint compliance.

prompt_templates.title: Data-Rich Technical Presentation
prompt_templates.prompt: Create 25-slide research presentation integrating multiple data sources. Use constraint-based design: no border boxes, text directly on backgrounds, maximum 3 bullets per slide. Generate charts as single visual elements, ensure 18pt minimum fonts, validate data accuracy against sources.

output_examples.input: Generate a board presentation analyzing our Q4 performance with budget recommendations
output: Slide 1: Executive Summary - Clean title slide with company branding
Slide 2-3: Revenue Analysis - Bar charts showing Q4 vs planned performance with 3 key insights each
Slide 4-5: Cost Structure - Pie charts breaking down expenses with variance explanations
Slide 6-7: Market Position - Competitive comparison table and market share visualization
Slide 8-9: Strategic Recommendations - 3 clear actions with supporting rationale per slide
Slide 10: Next Steps - Implementation timeline with color-coded priorities
All slides validated: contrast ratios >7:1, no border elements, consistent typography, thumbnail readable

best_practices: Always create pre-execution design plan before generating slides to ensure consistency across the deck
Use multi-chat architecture for presentations exceeding 15 slides to maintain quality and manage context
Validate output with quantified checks: contrast ratios, font sizes, margins, and prohibition compliance
anti_patterns: Never generate slides without explicit design restrictions - this leads to border boxes and layout failures
Avoid requesting 'professional looking' without quantified specifications - use exact measurements instead
Do not skip validation steps to save time - unchecked slides often have contrast or spacing issues

faq.question: Is this compatible with all PowerPoint versions?
faq.answer: Yes, uses html2pptx which generates standard .pptx files compatible with PowerPoint 2016+ and online versions.

faq.question: What's the maximum slide count?
faq.answer: No hard limit, but multi-chat architecture recommended for 30+ slides. Successfully tested with 100+ slide decks.

faq.question: Can I integrate my company's brand guidelines?
faq.answer: Yes, the skill includes brand integration process that adapts colors, typography, and spacing while maintaining constraint compliance.

faq.question: How does it ensure data accuracy?
faq.answer: Includes data validation checkpoints, source tracing requirements, and accuracy verification against original data files.

faq.question: What if the generated slides don't match my expectations?
faq.answer: Follow the failure response protocol: identify root cause, update design plan if needed, regenerate affected sections only.

faq.question: How does this compare to standard PowerPoint templates?
faq.answer: Unlike templates, this creates custom layouts optimized for your content using constraint-based design principles and accessibility standards.
